item.title: Situation along LAC tense but under control
item.description: The situation along the disputed Line of Actual Control LAC in Ladakh remained tense but under control a government official said on Sunday
item.itunes:subtitle: The situation along the disputed Line of Actual Control LAC in Ladakh remained tense but under control a government official said on Sunday
item.itunes:summary: The situation along the disputed Line of Actual Control LAC in Ladakh remained tense but under control a government official said on Sunday

item.title: CongNCP talks on hold wait for saffron combines decision
item.description: The seatsharing talks between the Congress and the NCP camps are not going well either The Congress on Sunday ignored the 24hour ultimatum issued by its ally through senior leader Praful Patel to better its offer of 124 seats
item.itunes:subtitle: The seatsharing talks between the Congress and the NCP camps are not going well either The Congress on Sunday ignored the 24hour ultimatum issued by its ally through senior leader Praful Patel to better its offer of 124 seats
item.itunes:summary: The seatsharing talks between the Congress and the NCP camps are not going well either The Congress on Sunday ignored the 24hour ultimatum issued by its ally through senior leader Praful Patel to better its offer of 124 seats

item.title: Centre scales down NDMA members authority
item.description: The Modi governments decision to scale down the status of NDMA members this week was aimed at discouraging influential retired civil servants from pulling strings to get a status upgrade at the cost of the countrys disaster preparedness

item.title: Azamgarh poll birds set to flock Maharashtra
item.description: In a show of strength several locals and NRIs hailing from Azamgarh would soon leave for Maharashtra to campaign for Samajwadi Partys state president Abu Asim Azmi who hails from Azamgarh
item.itunes:subtitle: In a show of strength several locals and NRIs hailing from Azamgarh would soon leave for Maharashtra to campaign for Samajwadi Partys state president Abu Asim Azmi who hails from Azamgarh
item.itunes:summary: In a show of strength several locals and NRIs hailing from Azamgarh would soon leave for Maharashtra to campaign for Samajwadi Partys state president Abu Asim Azmi who hails from Azamgarh

item.title: Only AIR DD to air breaking news IampB ministry tells netas
item.description: The information and broadcasting ministry has written to all the Union ministries and departments to give all breaking news relating to government decisions and policy initiatives only to AIR and Doordarshan before private TV channels and news agencies

item.title: Soon babus may also work from home
item.description: They are already spending longer hours at office but now government officials may soon end up working out of office too The Narendra Modi government this week lifted a decadeold restriction on the purchase of laptops notepads and tablets iPads for central government officials

item.title: Jaitley to attend investors meet in London
item.description: Union finance minister Arun Jaitley will be the first minister of the Narendra Modi led BJP government to visit London when he comes here for an investors meet in October official sources told HT
item.itunes:subtitle: Union finance minister Arun Jaitley will be the first minister of the Narendra Modi led BJP government to visit London when he comes here for an investors meet in October official sources told HT
item.itunes:summary: Union finance minister Arun Jaitley will be the first minister of the Narendra Modi led BJP government to visit London when he comes here for an investors meet in October official sources told HT

item.title: Chinese pitch tents in Chumar stand off continues
item.description: The standoff in Chumar area of Ladakh area took a new turn on Sunday with Chinese Peoples Liberation Army PLA pitching seven tents well within the Indian territory and showing no signs of withdrawing from the territory
item.itunes:subtitle: The standoff in Chumar area of Ladakh area took a new turn on Sunday with Chinese Peoples Liberation Army PLA pitching seven tents well within the Indian territory and showing no signs of withdrawing from the territory
item.itunes:summary: The standoff in Chumar area of Ladakh area took a new turn on Sunday with Chinese Peoples Liberation Army PLA pitching seven tents well within the Indian territory and showing no signs of withdrawing from the territory

item.title: In 3 months another case against DIG Paraskar
item.description: Suspended deputy inspector general of police Sunil Paraskar accused of raping a 26yearold woman has been booked in another case this time for outraging the modesty of a woman
item.itunes:subtitle: Suspended deputy inspector general of police Sunil Paraskar accused of raping a 26yearold woman has been booked in another case this time for outraging the modesty of a woman
item.itunes:summary: Suspended deputy inspector general of police Sunil Paraskar accused of raping a 26yearold woman has been booked in another case this time for outraging the modesty of a woman

item.title: 3 AAP MLAs land in Goa trigger fears of poaching by BJP
item.description: Three AAP MLAs Ashok Kumar Chauhan Dharmender Singh Koli and Prakash Jarwal left Delhi at noon and landed in Goa before being contacted by the party and asked to immediately return to Delhi
item.itunes:subtitle: Three AAP MLAs Ashok Kumar Chauhan Dharmender Singh Koli and Prakash Jarwal left Delhi at noon and landed in Goa before being contacted by the party and asked to immediately return to Delhi
item.itunes:summary: Three AAP MLAs Ashok Kumar Chauhan Dharmender Singh Koli and Prakash Jarwal left Delhi at noon and landed in Goa before being contacted by the party and asked to immediately return to Delhi

item.title: Nurse murdered in staff quarters in Delhi
item.description: A 45yearold nurse working at Lok Nayak Hospital in Delhi was found murdered Her body was found in a seminude condition in the bathroom at the hospitals staff quarters located near Delhi Gate in central Delhi
item.itunes:subtitle: A 45yearold nurse working at Lok Nayak Hospital in Delhi was found murdered Her body was found in a seminude condition in the bathroom at the hospitals staff quarters located near Delhi Gate in central Delhi
item.itunes:summary: A 45yearold nurse working at Lok Nayak Hospital in Delhi was found murdered Her body was found in a seminude condition in the bathroom at the hospitals staff quarters located near Delhi Gate in central Delhi

item.title: Dalits dragged by horses hit with pistol butt in Bihars wild west
item.description: Three persons including two dalit workers of the ruling Janata Dal United were allegedly tied to horses and dragged for quite a distance before being tied to a pole and hit with a pistol butt and sticks over a political dispute
item.itunes:subtitle: Three persons including two dalit workers of the ruling Janata Dal United were allegedly tied to horses and dragged for quite a distance before being tied to a pole and hit with a pistol butt and sticks over a political dispute
item.itunes:summary: Three persons including two dalit workers of the ruling Janata Dal United were allegedly tied to horses and dragged for quite a distance before being tied to a pole and hit with a pistol butt and sticks over a political dispute

item.title: Triple talaq in one go worst form of divorce scholars
item.description: Concerned over the increasing divorce rate among Muslims the ulema and scholars in the community have launched a sustainable movement to eradicate the practice of triple talaq

item.title: India drops Israeli LAHAT will develop own missile for Arjun Mk2
item.description: In an exclusive interview to HT DRDO chief Avinash Chander said The LAHAT missile doesnt figure in our plans anymore We are dropping it We have been working on a tubelaunched antitank missile which hopefully can be configured for the tanks cannon
item.itunes:subtitle: In an exclusive interview to HT DRDO chief Avinash Chander said The LAHAT missile doesnt figure in our plans anymore We are dropping it We have been working on a tubelaunched antitank missile which hopefully can be configured for the tanks cannon
item.itunes:summary: In an exclusive interview to HT DRDO chief Avinash Chander said The LAHAT missile doesnt figure in our plans anymore We are dropping it We have been working on a tubelaunched antitank missile which hopefully can be configured for the tanks cannon

item.title: NC worker shot dead in Srinagar
item.description: Lateef Ahmad Gupkari was shot at from close range by militants this afternoon police said He was rushed to ShereKashmir Institute of Medical Sciences at Soura where doctors declared him dead on arrival
